Title: Includes filing certain building permit applications containing false statements regarding tenant occupancy in the offense of offering a false instrument for filing in the first degree
Summary: Includes filing certain building permit applications containing false statements regarding tenant occupancy in the offense of offering a false instrument for filing in the first degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to including filing certain building permit applications containing false statements regarding tenant occupancy in the offense of offering a false instrument for filing in the first degree
